00145    struct originalIDs_t {
00146       uint32 itemID;
00147       uint32 origItemID;
00148       uint32 origMapID;
00149    };
00150 
00151    // operator to sort ids 
00152    struct SortIDs:
00153       public binary_function<
00154       const originalIDs_t,
00155       const originalIDs_t, bool > {
00156       
00157       bool operator () ( const originalIDs_t& a,
00158                          const originalIDs_t& b ) const {
00159          return a.itemID < b.itemID;
00160       }                     
00161    };
00162 
00163    // operator to search ids 
00164    struct SearchIDs:
00165       public binary_function<
00166       const originalIDs_t,
00167       uint32, bool > {
00168       bool operator () ( const originalIDs_t& a, uint32 b ) const {
00169          return a.itemID < b;
00170       }
00171    };
00172       
00173 
00174 
00175    typedef SimpleArrayObject<originalIDs_t> OriginalIDs;
00176 
00180    struct mapnotice_t {
00181       uint32 mapID;
00182       uint32 creationTime;
00183       int32 maxLat;
00184       int32 minLon;
00185       int32 minLat;
00186       int32 maxLon;
00187    };

00298 inline uint32 
00299 CountryOverviewMap::getNbrMaps()
00300 {
00301    return m_mapsInCountry.size();
00302 }
00303 
00304 inline uint32 
00305 CountryOverviewMap::getMapData(uint32 i, uint32& creationTime,
00306                                int32& maxLat, int32& minLon,
00307                                int32& minLat, int32& maxLon)
00308 {
00309    if (i < getNbrMaps()) {
00310       creationTime = m_mapsInCountry[i].creationTime;
00311       maxLat = m_mapsInCountry[i].maxLat;
00312       minLon = m_mapsInCountry[i].minLon;
00313       minLat = m_mapsInCountry[i].minLat;
00314       maxLon = m_mapsInCountry[i].maxLon;
00315       return (m_mapsInCountry[i].mapID);
00316    }
00317    return (MAX_UINT32);
00318 }
00319 
00320 inline uint32 
00321 CountryOverviewMap::getMaximunSizeOfStringItems()
00322 {
00323    return (4 + m_originalIDs.size() * STRING_ITEM_SIZE);
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00327 inline bool
00328 CountryOverviewMap::getOriginalIDs(uint32 itemID,
00329                                    uint32& origMapID,
00330                                    uint32& origItemID)
00331 {
00332    
00333    OriginalIDs::iterator it = lower_bound( m_originalIDs.begin(),
00334                                            m_originalIDs.end(),
00335                                            itemID,
00336                                            SearchIDs() );
00337 
00338    if ( it != m_originalIDs.end() && itemID == (*it).itemID ) {
00339       origItemID = (*it).origItemID;
00340       origMapID = (*it).origMapID;
00341       return true;
00342    }
00343 
00344    origItemID = MAX_UINT32;
00345    origMapID = MAX_UINT32;
00346 
00347    return false;
00348 }
00349 
00350 inline const Stack* 
00351 CountryOverviewMap::getFilterStack(uint32 level, uint32 polygon)
00352 {
00353    if ( (level < NBR_SIMPLIFIED_COUNTRY_GFX) && 
00354         (polygon < m_nbrGfxPolygons) ) {
00355       return ((const Stack*) m_simplifiedGfxStack[level][polygon]);
00356    } else { 
00357       return (NULL);
00358    }
00359 }
